DOC.brief_summary: To Evaluate Effectiveness Electronic Training Program Orienting Interpreting [ 18F ] flutemetamol Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Images .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Electronic Training Program Orienting Interpreting 18FFlutemetamol Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Images
DOC.criteria: Subject receive dose Flutemetamol F 18 Injection range approximately 185 MBq approximately 370 MBq . The subject classify one following : 1 . Endoflife subject expire underwent brain autopsy , histochemical ( HC ) confirmation brain amyloid status . 2 . Subject known/suspected normal pressure hydrocephalus ( NPH ) underwent brain biopsy , HC confirmation brain amyloid status . 3 . Elderly healthy volunteer ( age ≥55 ) . 4 . Young healthy volunteer ( age ≤40 ) . 5 . Subject probable Alzheimer Disease ( pAD ) . 6 . Subject amnestic Mild Cognitive Impairment ( aMCI ) .
